b: when is area.s2 == 1  then become next in 3.5
when is area.s2 = 1  then play bear with -1 octaves 200 varied-pitch
when is area.s2 = 1  then play distant explosion with 1.4 delay 300 reversal 2 skip varied-pitch
when is area.s2 = 1  then play metal cling with 100 -5 octaves
when is area.s2 == 0 then become next in 3.5
when is area.s2 == 0 then play bear with -1 octaves 200 varied-pitch
when is area.s2 == 0 then play distant explosion with 1.4 delay 300 reversal 2 skip
when is area.s2 == 0 then play metal cling with 100 -5 octaves
